title: KEEN IS REAL
content:
I AM THE FIRST TO FIND IT!!!!!

[url=http://nssdc.gsfc.nasa.gov/database/MasterCatalog?sc=1975-083C]nssdc.gsfc.nasa.gov/datab...=1975-083C[/url]

In the story, it just says the Viking Lander in general killed the Garg king, but now we know it's Viking 2. Scroll down to mission profile, 2nd paragraph.

MUAHAHHAHA!

title: KEEN IS....
content:
I didnt feel like replying but I did read the stuff you found.

I agree with you, I am being Lazy....

And, I have a idea how to get more people to see your post.

By posting this!

An old keen drawing from id anthology.

title: Re: KEEN IS....
content:
Wow, thanks! That's cool! I should really take a better look at that Anthology, I have it under my bed. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

content:

title: Re: KEEN IS....

No it came from 'THE BooK oF id', it's full of all kinds of pic's.

It could be fan art or a fan letter...maybe Scott Miller's.

title: Re: KEEN IS....
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Gohan: It could be fan art or a fan letter...maybe Scott Miller's.[hr][/quote]

Looks like it was drawn by someone named 'Janice'. Or maybe was drawn for someone named 'Janice'.

Or maybe 'Janice' has nothing to do with it at all...

It'd be fun to read Scott Miller's fan letters. I wonder if he drew some fan art to go with them...

title: KEEN IS....THE REAL STORY.
content:
Unbeknownst to NASA, the Viking 2 Lander settled to the surface of Mars, it caused a major political upheaval. Viking 2 actually landed on the despotic Martian king! The Yorps (The extremely friendly one-eyed Martians) were free from Enslavement. And the Gargs (The vicious, aggressive Martians) were angry.

---------------------------------------FREEDOM!!---------------------------------------

content:

Don't think of me as an ordinary man.

Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]

title: Re: KEEN IS....THE REAL STORY.
content:
On my first post, follow the link, and scroll down to mission profile. In there, it says:

"Due to radar misidentification of a rock or highly reflective surface, the thrusters fired an extra time 0.4 seconds before landing, cracking the surface and raising dust. The lander settled down with one leg on a rock, tilted at 8.2 degrees."

But we know it's the grag king that Viking II landed on.

And I'd appreciate if you all would not steal my post and talk about that other pic, not to mention no one here is enthusiastic about this find................................[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-furious.gif[/img] - .... . / ..- -. .. ...- . .-. ... . / .. ... / - --- .- ... - / .-.

title: Re: KEEN IS....THE REAL STORY.
content:
It's not that people aren't enthusiastic, but it's just that everybody else was in on it, that this whole "landed on rock" thing is just a cover up for what really happened.
So... now you're aware of this conspiracy as well... please be quiet about it.
Nobody is supposed to mention anything that might lead others in the direction of the truth.
Actually I'm surprised your posts haven't been deleted yet, but I suspect this whole thread will be gone soon.

And of course Keen is real, Keen is Tom Hall.Retodon8
Sheep happens! [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Keen/Graphics/K1_nme_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

title: MortimerInBlack IS THE FIRST TO FIND IT!!!!!
content:
My idea was successful, more people replied to your topic after I had posted my reply.

[quote]Quote:[hr]this is rediculous; just after levellord complained about everyone being lazy and lame and unenthusiastice, and everyone like agreed with her.... [hr][/quote]

I'm slightly enthusiastic about it.

Shocking?[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img]

No.

Not really.

Too bad my first post had a negative effect, stealing your post but my second post got it back to what your first post was about and it got more people to reply.

Maybe this post can make even more reply's.

Hmm.....Now that I'm done with that, I can say what I should of said in the first post about what you had found because it was most interesting what you had found, that in fact it was the Viking 2 Lander that landed on the Martian king, yes you and only you could have found it, funny that you had found this while looking up old NASA information, yes you are the first, congratulations on finding it, I would not have made such a observation by my self, cool.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hey thats cool how you put the viking 2 information to the story in commander keen, I never would have thought it was the one that killed the Martian king.

Funny, very funny.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img]

congratulations on finding it MortimerInBlack, you are the first.

[center] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] [/center]


Here's a question for you, what happened to the Vorticons when doom happened?

title: Re: MortimerInBlack IS THE FIRST TO FIND IT!!!!!
content:
well thanx AG, but as for your question, idk.
if u mean Doom, as in Doom the game by ID, then those are 2 different universes that dont corollate, so it doesnt make sense.
if u mean when they got enslaved, well, idk either, they got rescued lol.
maybe im reading into the question 2hard...- .... . / ..- -. .. ...- . .-. ... . / .. ... / - --- .- ... - / .-.
